name: IC Carddass DRAGONBALL
description:
Welcome to the world of DRAGONBALL!

"IC Carddass DRAGONBALL" is the online Trading Card Game, collecting anime character cards to build your own decks for the battle with friends all over the world!!
In addition, physical cards with NFC chip inside that is recognized in this Application are also available at stores.(No difference from Digital cards in the App.)

[Game Features]
1. "Tutorial" mode
"Tutorial mode" gives a player learning opportunity how to play the game, providing 41 "FREE" digital cards.
Let's learn the rules with Fun!!

2. "Deck Building" mode
A player can obtain character cards via "GASHA"(Normal and Rare available). In-Game point called "Zenny" is required to draw cards from GASHAs. A player can get those Zenny points by playing online battles, winning battles.
All cards you get will be stored in your own Digital Binder. Build a strong deck to win!!

3. "Online Battle" mode
This mode brings you an exciting online trading card battle wit your friends in the world!
An opponent player will be automatically matched for the battle anytime, anywhere!
You may battle anytime with friends registered in the "Friend mode" too.

4. "Digital Item" mode
In this mode, a player can obtain background arts, battle effects with In-Game points.

5. "Update" mode
The updated information of the game will be announced in this mode.

[Physical Cards also available!]
As well as digital cards from GASHA, physical cards with NFC chip are available at retail stores.
With a scanner at retail stores, your physical cards can be transferred into the digital binder in the App and can be used same as digital cards from GASHA. the set will be available at end of September, at GMS, CVS and other card shops.
- NOTE - All physical cards are available in the App via GAHSA mode too.

Set 1 Booster Pack(5 cards): MSRP 200yen+tax per pack
Set 1 Carddass Booster(5 cards): MSRP 200yen per set
Set 1 Starter Set(41 cards): MSRP 1500yen+tax per set
Set 1 Starter Set with NFC reader(41 cards+1 NFC reader): MSRP 3000yen+tax per set
